getOrdinalWorkingDayOfMonth

public final DateHolder getOrdinalWorkingDayOfMonth(Month month,
                                                    int ordinal)
Calculates the n-th working day of the month (the ordinal)

Parameters:
month -
ordinal - the ordinal of the day. 1 for the first day, 2 for the second , etc...
Returns:
DateHolder corresponding to the n-th working day of the month
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if ordinal is less than 1
